name: Droid a STAR WARS story
description:
GOAL OF THE GAME
Goal of the game. Collect on of those 3 artifacts for a client:
1. a sith holocron ( Darth Nyr’s holocron)
2. galaxy’s crystal ( Old crystals that displays the location of the Matrix)
3. OLD REPUBLIC Galaxy map ( Map was engraved on a Kyber Crystal by Darth Vlapae )

HOW TO PLAY THE GAME
Both Players are controlled by the same keyboard. Player 1 moves by pressing A & D from the keyboard and shoots his weapon by pressing E. Player 2 moves by pressing left arrow & right arrow from keyboard and attacks his enemy by pressing comma.
